m_szDocTitle: Toyota launching fuel cell car Mirai - The Portland Press Herald / Maine Sunday Telegram
m_szDocSumamry: increase font size Toyota launching fuel cell car Mirai Toyota is betting that fuel cell vehicles could over time equal or surpass plug-in electric hybrids in consumer acceptance. By GREG GARDNERDetroit Free Press Share Read Article 1 of 4 Toyota will begin selling its Mirai fuel cell car in five Northeast states (Maine not among them) next year.
